code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import"./Family.css";import CategoriesNav from"../categoriesNav/categoriesNav";import{fetchData}from"../../Api/dataApi";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Family=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const{t}=useTranslation();useEffect(()=>{const fetchFamily=async()=>{try{const result=await fetchData("Family");setData(result);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchFamily();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Family",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoriesNav,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"Family-title",children:t("available_family")}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:t("loading")}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:t("error_message",{message:error})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Family-container",children:data.map(family=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Family-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(family.id||family._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Array.isArray(family.images)&&family.images.length>0?family.images[0]:t("default_image"),alt:family.title||t("no_name"),className:"Family-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Family-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"Family-name",children:family.title||t("no_name")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Family-description",children:family.description||t("no_description")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Family-price",children:t("price",{price:family.price||t("no_price")})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Family-location",children:t("location",{location:family.location||t("no_location")})})]})]},family.id||family._id))})]});};export default Family;
